title: Localization key cannot be blank when adding
description: When adding a localization key, it is not possible to leave the key blank. This prevents the externalized text from being displayed in the chart.
OB: In the properties file, if the localization key is left blank but a valid value is provided, the externalized text cannot be displayed in the chart title.
EB: The externalized text should be displayed in the chart title even if the localization key is left blank but a valid value is provided.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Open the properties file2. Leave the localization key blank but provide a valid value3. Check that the externalized text is not displayed in the chart title
